text: Ni akutiji soni: “Yaili mu ndumbo sya ayi ilangoyi iŵele yaachalume ŵetupe basi, soni iŵele haraam kwa achakongwe ŵetu.” Nambo naga kupagwa chili chachiwe, basi niakuŵa ŵakamusyangana (kulya) chalakwecho (ŵanaose achalume ni achakongwe). Tachalipila (pakwapa ilagasyo) ligongo lya yakusimba yao (yaunami), chisimu Jwalakwe ni Jwalunda lwakusokoka, Jwakumanyilila nnope
